vulnerability_findings.name: Time dependency bug
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(now > acc.unlockTime, "Unlock time should be greater than current time");

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: msg in Log.AddMessage (patch_2.sol#53) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-builtin
vulnerability_findings.message: Log.AddMessage.msg (local variable @ patch_2.sol#53) shadows built-in symbol "msg"
